price: Wͻn a wͻsuro Nyankopͻn no, sε ͻbosam de adwen bͻne bi ma wͻn a, wͻkae Nyankopͻn, εba saa a, εma wͻn aniso da hͻ kann (kae Nyankopͻn asotwee ne N’adom a εwͻ hͻ Daakye).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittaqaw idhā massahum ṭāifun mina al-shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mub'ṣirūna
